articles.title: Arsenal captain Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang bids farewell to Mesut Ozil after ending his Gunners hell - Daily Mail
articles.description: Mesut Ozil has joined the Turkish giants after agreeing with Arsenal to terminate his £350,000-per-week contract early, and will officially be unveiled as a Fenerbahce player imminently.
articles.content:
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has become the latest Arsenal star to say his goodbyes to Mesut Ozil on social media ahead of his Fenerbahce unveiling.
